name: Learn Unity
tagline: Unity project examples for the book Learn Unity 4 for iOS Game Development
body:
LearnUnity
==========

Example projects for an upcoming book, Learn Unity for iOS Game Development, currently available as an alpha on the Apress site:

http://www.apress.com/9781430248750

The projects don't include assets from the Unity Asset Store and Standard Assets that are used in the book. The full app with Asset Store assets is on the App Store as Learn Unity:

https://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=634845779&mt=8

Questions can be posted on the Unity forum

http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/173210-Learn-Unity-for-iOS-Game-Development

![book cover](http://www.fugutalk.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/9781430248750-1.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
